title: Luxury, location & Convenience!  FURNISHED 1x1 in Pac Heights!
posting_body: ['This building is conveniently located to Polk Corridor, Whole Foods, and Lafayette Park.', 'These significant aspects of the neighborhood truly make this an exceptional location in a Pacific Heights setting with all of San Francisco at your doorstep.', 'Apartment Features:', '• Fully Furnished Apartment', '• Bay and City Views', '• Granite Countertops & Hardwood Floors', '• New Cabinetry & Appliances', '• Great sunlight!!', 'Property and Neighborhood:', '• Central Pacific Heights Location', '• Gated Parking Available', '• Lobby with Controlled Access', "Don't miss this opportunity.", 'For more information about this property, please visit us at <URL> or <URL>.', 'You can also call us at', 'show contact info', 'to set up a tour of our community today!', '* Virtual & In-Person Tours Available', '* Please note photos may not be of the exact apartment available.', '* Pets Welcome', 'This unit is a rental unit subject to the San Francisco Rent Ordinance, which limits evictions without just cause, and which states that any waiver by a tenant of their rights under the Rent Ordinance is void as contrary to public policy.', 'do NOT contact me with unsolicited services or offers']
